bug.short_desc: Update versions of org.eclipse.jdt.annotation bundles and references in feature.xml

long_desc.thetext:
master
> Re: [platform-releng-dev] 4.5.0 N-Build: N20140704-2000 - BUILD FAILED
> This was because the jdt.feature was expecting jdt.annotation version to be > from 2.0.0 - 2.0.1 but found to be 2.0.100. > > I have fixed the version to be 2.0.1.
I don't think 2.0.1 would be any different from 2.0.100 (but it would not adhere the versioning rules). AFAIK, the /org.eclipse.jdt-feature/feature.xml can either contain version="0.0.0", which will be replaced with one of the versions available at build time. Or it can have a version number that exactly matches an available bundle.
I'll revert this to 2.0.100 and adjust the feature.

(In reply to Markus Keller from comment #1) > Fixed with > http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/ > ?id=c6504e7590c0485438e0c9d3059dbc3e5e9435eb and > http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.git/commit/ > ?id=29b552b9a0e87e119663a0da7d73b63d1308dd87
Thanks Markus, that wasn't my first choice either, but thought you were on vacation :)

Do we really want to eagerly increase version numbers for this bundle? I see chances it could go without any change into 4.4.1 or 4.5. (Not speaking about exact probabilities here). In that case, wouldn't it be great to keep the 2.0.0 version number?
Might be even more relevant, this time next year, when the bundle has further stabilized ...

(In reply to Stephan Herrmann from comment #3) > Do we really want to eagerly increase version numbers for this bundle? I see > chances it could go without any change into 4.4.1 or 4.5. (Not speaking > about exact probabilities here). In that case, wouldn't it be great to keep > the 2.0.0 version number? > > Might be even more relevant, this time next year, when the bundle has > further stabilized ...
I was merely applying the same rule we follow for every one of our bundles. This time the bundle changed with some preference updates and hence the version change.
Verified for 4.5 M1 with build I20140804-2000.
